byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood reported from Concord, and Katharine Q. Seelye from Boston.
byline.original: By JESS BIDGOOD and KATHARINE Q. SEELYE

abstract: Sen Kelly Ayotte, New Hampshire's highest-ranking republican, is joining many top Republican lawmakers in urging Rep Frank Guinta of New Hampshire to resign in wake of his settlement for 2010 campaign finance violation; Guinta says he will remain in his seat.
lead_paragraph: Since Representative Frank Guinta admitted a campaign finance violation, his biggest problem has not been Democrats; it has been top officials of his own party.

headline.main: New Hampshire Republicans Call on Frank Guinta to Serve His Party by Resigning
headline.print_headline: Top Republicans Call on Congressman to Serve His Party by Resigning

snippet: Since Representative Frank Guinta admitted a campaign finance violation, his biggest problem has not been Democrats; it has been top officials of his own party.
